name: Wobble Waddle
description:
*Ludum Dare 49

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Wobble Waddle is a physics-based game where you need to serve food  to starving monsters

You just got your legs and arms.

You can't walk properly, nor can you hold your tray stably.

But the Monster are Hungry  and you'd better serve them fast !

You'll be given a random tray on every level to complete this task.

*Controls

Use A, D or ←, → to move

Use your mouse to drag the plate

Use mouth wheel to rotate the plate
